title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 2 Amy Dash
itunes:title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 2 Amy Dash
description:
Jason McIntyre and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, are excited to see student athletes afforded the ability to profit off their Name, Image and Likeness, but LaVar sees big pitfalls in how dollar signs can ruin families and the spirit of education. FSR Legal Analyst Amy Dash clarifies the specifics about NIL and the question of consent in the Trevor Bauer story. Plus, a debate of whether or not the Cowboys were the right choice for Hard Knocks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
